p: As previously mentioned, the main protease is one of the key enzymes in the viral life cycle. Together with other non-structural proteins (papain-like protease, helicase, RNA-dependent RNA polymerase) and the spike glycoprotein structural protein, it is essential for interactions between the virus and host cell receptor during viral entry [ 11]. Initial analyses of genomic sequences of the four nsps mentioned above indicate that those enzymes are highly conserved, sharing more than 90% sequence similarity with the corresponding SARS-CoV enzymes [ 12].
